column1: Happy Thanksgiving #TX25! As we gather with our family and friends today we reflect on the abundance of blessings given to us by our Creator. https://t.co/V5qy4WbqNT

The President has every right to ask the courts to investigate any voting irregularities.

Rules for thee but not for me apparently...https://t.co/6IVxKy36rM
.@realDonaldTrump don’t give out don’t give in. We will keep fighting for you and for every American to be heard!
In Texas we have a saying called fair and square—you can count on it. We must make sure this election is fair and free and EVERY legal vote is counted.

Every LEGAL vote must be counted. Fair and free elections are the pillar of our democracy — the courts are in place to resolve any disputes and to apply the law. The American people decide the results of our election and every voice must be heard.
Call your state legislators in GA NC PA and AZ and tell them they run the elections — not the radical Dems. In other words do your job.   Stand up and stand with this President.
This is the most corrupt election in our lifetime. Where is the DOJ and AG?
Radical Dems tried to do away with law and order and are now trying to do away with law and order at the ballot box.
We will fight for @realDonaldTrump — we’ve got your back! @TeamTrump @EricTrump @IvankaTrump

SHARE with your friends! EVERY legal vote must be counted and we must ensure Democrat election officials are held accountable for any abuse of our free and fair electoral process. @realDonaldTrump @EricTrump @IvankaTrump @TeamTrump https://t.co/fuNBSfMP2e

EVERY legal ballot must be counted with full transparency — it’s unacceptable to have illegal votes counted in America and corrupt Democrat officials must be monitored! It is vital that we protect our democracy and ensure confidence in our free and fair electoral process.
